2. Download¶

A prebuilt version of the CFDwavemaker can be downloaded from at the locations given below

CFDwavemaker for Linux ( compiled using ubuntu (v1604) with openMP support)

CFDwavemaker for Win64 ( compiled on Win10, Visual Studio 2019)

unpack the files and follow the installation instructions in Section 4.
